channel.title: Can i get my main not banned?
channel.description: Hey. I have cheated before but then i got banned on my main also (item transferring) But if i create a level 3. and start macro on that. And never even talk to my main..will my main still get banned? :( ty

LOL! Did you get banned??? Hahaha. And sometimes they can track thou Ip. I think lol, morning over here, brain still not on…

item.title: Can i get my main not banned?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:11, topic:4611”]Or just have two RuneScape’s open one with regular java, and the other with unsigned java.

Have one say, “free stuff to anyone.”
Then have your other guy say, “me me me.” Trade and then…

Bang! You tricked the machine into thinking it was legit with only 1 computer! MUAHAHA.[/quote]still gets you banned cause of their uid.dat and subnodes i think

Read full topic
item.source: Can i get my main not banned?

item.title: Can i get my main not banned?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Or just have two RuneScape’s open one with regular java, and the other with unsigned java.

Have one say, “free stuff to anyone.”
Then have your other guy say, “me me me.” Trade and then…

Bang! You tricked the machine into thinking it was legit with only 1 computer! MUAHAHA.

Read full topic
item.source: Can i get my main not banned?

item.title: Can i get my main not banned?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:9, topic:4611”]just drop trade[/quote]drop trading gets you banned. just use two computers, put them in the same busy bank, say

c1:free stuff to any1
c2: trades c1
c2: put noob items up
c1: accept trade
c2: ty

and bang! you tricked the trade machine into thinking that was legit

p.s. c1 and c2= computer 1 and computer 2

Read full topic
